name: Project AZAZEL
description:
[PLEASE PLAY ON FULLSCREEN]
A game made during the EGD Game Jam of 2020 (Nov 20 - Nov 22).

You play as a doctor who has been randomly selected to become the ambassador of humanity, charged with the task of nurturing A.Z.A.Z.E.L, an AI that has the ability to change the world. Choose between one of the two choices given for each question the AI asks you, where each reply will have an impact on A.Z.A.Z.E.L's opinion on humanity.

Remember, you wield the power to change humanity forever.

Credits:

  • "Space Game Intro"  and "Starlight" by Eric Matyas of www.soundimage.org
  • Made with the help of Yarn Spinner

Created By: Lizardcat Studios

  • Lead Programmer - Kelvin S.
  • Programmer - Josue E.
  • Lead Artist & Programmer - Eva Y.
  • Artist - Jesus S.
  • Narrative Design & Audio - Emmanuel C. & Jorge H.
